text.text_translated: Graffiti is pictures or writing on walls. Is graffiti art? This depends on your point of view. But in many countries, the law says it is vandalism. Vandalism is a crime. Someone paints on a building. The building is not theirs. People paint on public buildings. They also paint on buildings that people own. The police stop many street artists. Some artists have to pay fines. Many city leaders complain about the cost. They say it costs a lot of money to clean the graffiti. They clean it from buildings, buses and trains.
